name: Sender (itch)
description:
FIGHT THE MEDIA FROM WITHIN

Sender is a fan-made prequel of Wolfire Games' Receiver that attempts to translate the famous cumbersome gun mechanics into a 2D experience, published on the 11th of December, 2015. In Sender, instead of assuming the role of an outsider, you play as an insider piloting a drone, collecting cassette tapes which you can use to warn others about the looming MindKill event. The entire game is singleplayer and comes with three normal maps and one bonus map. Endless high score possibilities await you with five different difficulty settings.

DRONES ARE SUPERHOT

A separate build of the game inspired by SUPERHOT is also downloadable, dating back to the 7th of April, 2016, entitled SenderHOT. This version of the game was developed for a SUPERHOT fan-game contest, and was one of the first 50 entries to automatically be awarded prizes.

Sender was created by me, Jack5, with some programming by TAT3XD and some sound effects by Navaro. This game has an Attribution 4.0 license, meaning you can use it for commercial purposes, and are not required to uphold this license for your use of it, so long as you credit me by name. Any alteration of this license requires permission from me.

Please be aware that the music in Sender and its official soundtrack do not have the same license. You can preview the associated license when you access the soundtrack download page.
